website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you don't like the feel of silicone pot holders.
pros: 100% terry looped cotton with heat resistant silverstone lining
Hanging loop for easy storage and access
Comes in apple green, aqua, artichoke green, black, brown, dark blue, forest green, grape, grey, light brown, mineral grey, orange, red, white, wine and yellow
cons: Some customers said they felt heat for pots above 350-degrees Fahrenheit

customer_reviews.title: These are basic small potholders, but that is what ...
customer_reviews.text: These are basic small potholders, but that is what I wanted. They are a lot easier to use than those large, stiff ones. Sometimes, you'll need to use 2 per hand if your item is particularly hot, but these come in a pack of 5. Also just the right size to put under hot plates and bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Teakle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: These are thin but that is what I wanted. I don't like the thick ones that are hard to feel what you are grabbing. Although they are thin, they still block the heat. I will only buy these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gorlick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Color is just what I wanted. Clean and durable so far after using them for a month+ and a handful of washes. Will update the review in case they disintegrate sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Alferez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the 'glove' pot holders so trying to find some like these were a big hit for me. They work great and wash well.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wrong with the price. These are working out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Cloth is easily cleaned. Works great as trivet as well. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: great hot pads....love the color
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these. I wasn't sure about buying new ones and spending money on them. I always just buy hotpads second hand, but decided to splurge and get a set that match. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Happyhen

customer_reviews.title: Use them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Functional and pretty they pretty much work as expected. Because they are pretty, I like showing them off in the kitchen. They bring an extra spot of brightness into the space and stay handy. I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for craft years. I’ve used them a couple times with fabric paint to make holiday pads with the kids. Super great buy.
customer_reviews.author: jesssibs

customer_reviews.author: A. Waterfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made heavy pot holders. I was glad to find something in purple as it's hard to find accessories for a purple kitchen. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice potholders
customer_reviews.text: They are simple and do their job, have enough structure to feel protected but not too thick as to make pots impossible to grip.
customer_reviews.author: herndonchic

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity Perfected with Lots of Color Options!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! My Mom has been looking for the "old fashioned" style pot holders .........cannot be found in stores. I ordered these in 2 colors for her and they are perfect. We ordered the navy and dark green......the colors are rich and the overall quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: teal eyes

customer_reviews.title: five  Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality--one of them is falling apart and I only used it once. 8/2/16 Update--company oontacted me to let me know they are refunding my money and they were very apologetic that the potholders were defective. customer_reviews.author: Debra Autenrieth

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought there to keep myself from being burned while cooking after my Great Dane decided to open the drawer and eat my other potholders. I've not been burned during any activity which may be coincidence, or maybe these are magic. More realistically, I can afford to replace them again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bote

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love these potholders. This is the size I wanted as I don't like the larger ones or the mitts. Very pretty color too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight and wash beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Love these hot pads! They are perfect weight and wash beautifully. The other ones I have ordered started unraveling the first time I washed them. These are the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Chef C

customer_reviews.title: It's a potholder!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find potholders without the silicone stuff but these are just plain old potholders -- just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fragile, but useful
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, and they do what they're supposed to do. Here's the thing: following included instructions, I washed them before use. I used cold water, and my machine is older, so its agitation is more delicate flower than crazed bull. One of the pads is unraveling. Badly. I mended it, but the outlook is not good for any longevity. So, these are temporary additions to the kitchen, I fear.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Wallach

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: The pot may be hot but the hands stay cool. The only thing that I found a little disappointing is the fact that the care instructions advise air drying after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Clarke

customer_reviews.title: do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: While these pot holders look pretty, they are terrible quality. The first time I used them, as I was removing a pan from the oven, the lining side brushed against an oven rack and caught fire. It actually flamed. Another pot holder burned on the cotton side. They were a complete waste of money and a danger.
customer_reviews.author: anita mancini

customer_reviews.title: Frayed 1st wash
customer_reviews.text: I ran these through the wash the day I received them, and this is how they came out. Very disappointed in the quality, but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissieobar

customer_reviews.title: Felt heat/burn above 350 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Anything hotter than 350 degrees, you will feel. I bought these for the thanksgiving baking I’d be doing this week. Tested them out and these did not work as great as I was hoping they would. As I was taking my pans in and out I noticed my hands would start to get hot and if I held on to anything longer I’ll feel a burn.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved pot holders with the heat resistant backing. These are nice, they have a nice color and they're easy to fold and grip. Although I don't use it, each has a loop for hanging. And they do the job - but not for a long period of time. The terry cloth is soft, it's 100% cotton, made in China. But it's really thin. You can't hold a hot baking sheet for more than a few seconds. Long enough to lift from the oven to the stove top, but not to get it much further. Even so, I like them and doubled up works in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Varley M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit thin and way too small. They barely cover my hand and I was afraid I'd burn myself if my hand should slip even the slightest bit. Not very heat-resistant. Could feel the heat in just the short amount of time it took to remove a hot pan from the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Raeann Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, exactly what I was looking for. You wouldn't believe how difficult it is to find a nice dark green for home decor. We live in the forest and love our forest colors. This is a beautiful dark or hunter green. The stitching is good, no loose threads and they are heat resistant. I bake most days and even at the 425-450 degrees I roast veggies at, these allowed me to safely take them out and use them as hot mats to protect my beautiful rustic solid wood table my husband built. This color would be perfect for Christmas too- and you never have enough pot holders for the holidays! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryCottage

customer_reviews.title: No telling whAt they would have been like after many washings
customer_reviews.text: As package instructed I washed before use.. when they came out of the dryer 3 out of the 5 had become frayed at the loop. No telling whAt they would have been like after many washings.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: These are great!  I'd buy them again in a heartbeat  :)
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I don't know why it seems to be harder these days to find cotton terry cloth pot holders. While I know the heat resistant fabric on one side is preferable to most, I really prefer terry on both sides as it's more flexible. However, these do the job and the color is a really beautiful deep olive-y green (not the darker olive, but a bright deep olive if that makes sense) not an obnoxious bright apple green I was dreading. I'd buy them again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: BestDayofMyLife

customer_reviews.title: keeps the shape
customer_reviews.text: I wash them first before using like the directions said..without using fabric softener. I dried four over the heat resister so to keep their shape. But I had accidently had left the fifth one in the dryer. It came out dried and looked as good as the rest of the hot pads. I like them. After 40 years of marriage it was nice to get quality replacements. Getting 5 instead of four is like getting an extra one just incase something happens to one. Nice and well done.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: These are ok and I mostly use for that hot bowl in front of the tv meal. I do wish they were a bit thicker for cooking pots though. I don’t feel they hold back enough heat with a big pot from stove to sink as thin as they are. Or baking items out of oven you need to double them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandpile

customer_reviews.title: Ripped seams, pulling threads - won't buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Am I expected to hand wash pot holders? With the first wash, two of these ripped open at the seam. Too many threads pulled. Won't order again
customer_reviews.author: St. Pete blues lover

customer_reviews.title: Pot holders could be better quality, far as stitching and thickness of materials

Pot holders could be better quality, far as stitching and thickness of materials. Not all pot holders have the same thickness. Also this is not 100% cotton, the inside(silvery/grey) area is polyester.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive with a dual purpose
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality of the product. These are heavy weight pot holders with a terry cloth type top and silver heat resistant fabric on the reverse. They are thick enough to protect your hands well when taking a casserole, etc. out of the oven plus can be used as good looking trivets/coaster/hot pad. Would recommend and buy again,
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo lady

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality match
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly a little disappointed with this purchase. I just needed some basic oven mitts and pot holders, but the low price also meant the quality wasn’t the highest. customer_reviews.author: Alicia L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have much heat resistance

customer_reviews.author: Gorlank

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A HEAT PROOF POT HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous pot holders over the past year.....Some were in shades of pretty colours.....but the potholders got little burn holes in them when they hit a hot surface. These really hold up....especially when cooking on a hot wood stove. A dull gray colour, but I won't complain other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly lady

customer_reviews.title: Great find

The colors aren’t that great, but other than that I’m extremely happy with this Amazon find
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Poor Heat Resistance

They do seem rather thin upon arrival, but not that thin. When we started to use them we realized they are the least heat resistant pot holders we have ever owned. I would recommend looking at another product.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bendy...

These do great and they perfectly match one of the color schemes in my kitchen. You also get five in a pack for around $11.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Normal Potholders for a Fair Price

To my surprise I couldn't find these normal potholders in any local store so luckily- Amazon to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: S. Adjemian

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade From the Dollar Store Potholders

Have not washed them yet so I cannot speak to how well they hold up to washing. Well worth the price, we think.
customer_reviews.author: Ken King

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the quality and confident these pot holders will last a long time. One side has a towel like surface while the reverse side has a denser fabric that seems made to take contact with heat. No issues with these pot holders whatsoever and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value

They are very pliable being not to thin or thick and bulky. You may start feeling the heat come thru if you hold a very hot container for an extended period of time. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Best Potholders you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Got the tip about these potholders from Epicurious! We washed them right after we received them as they suggested. customer_reviews.title: ok but not the same

customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Great Pot Holders

We can use these for simple things like holding a pot or for getting hot pots out of the oven. They are very flexible and adjust to whatever you are holding. I just love these. I think I will be ordering more in a different color. I currently have he blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I washed these before I was going to use them ...

customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP!!!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product. Not pocketed though, as I imagined form the picture. Otherwise, very fine product.

However, the quality is very good. I gave 4 stars based on if I understood the product beforehand. As a sidenote, you guys should totally make a similar design, just slightly longer and pocketed. Maybe Im talking about mitts -_-
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money on These

Then, the binding around the edge melts when it touches oven-hot items like oven racks at 375 degrees. One potholder was accidently left on a hot stove burner and the binding melted into a pool of black liquid. I 'm throwing these away!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl Wood

customer_reviews.title: No more black marks!!!

customer_reviews.title: Beware

customer_reviews.author: DoverDiva

customer_reviews.title: The color is mainly what I was after

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use

customer_reviews.author: Jeannie haverstick

customer_reviews.title: Style and function in one!

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right pot holders.

customer_reviews.title: THIN, BUT DEFINITELY PROTECTS YOUR HAND FROM OVEN HEAT.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift

customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good

customer_reviews.title: Be careful exposing the backside of the pot holder to heat!

customer_reviews.title: Super find!

customer_reviews.title: Not too bulky
